Don’t buy. The fit is pretty fitted especially if you’re curvy. I ordered three pair ( black, blue, and brown). My brown pair came damaged. My blue pair zipper broke wearing them on the first day. I’m a VM and I just wanted a good pair of cargos because they’re the best style of pants for me. I was disappointed especially for how I much I paid. Don’t waste your money.

I just received these and they fit so good. Short girl friendly, I’m 5’3. I have trouble with cargos being too long and they are perfect hit me at heel. Size predictor was spot on I ordered a small fits perfect. Love the style, good quality fabric although I have not washed them yet. Comfortable moveable fabric and mildly stretchy but they are still a light denim material. love the pockets and the placement. Color is expected I for the black, I’m using them for work. I do love these cargo pants but I have a 32” inseam (I am 5’5”, 135lbs) - bought Medium, fit fine everywhere but I wish the length was longer by at least an inch and a half. JSN.

The color is beautiful and the material feels great. I ordered a large based on reviews from others that were my height and weight. They fit SO GOOD everywhere except for the waist. I absolutely love these pants. Fit is great. The material is so soft.
Good quality.  Pants are just too short.  Make them longer.

The fabric is super soft while also being firm, and I love all the functional pockets. For reference, I am 5'2 (32-26-35), so I usually have to hem my pants every time I get them due to my height and measurements, but these fit like a glove!

wanted to love these, but just can't.  they fit really weird.  normally wear a medium, but i couldnt even get them zipped.  returned and ordered large.  barely a difference.  however, after a few hours, they have stretched so bad they are drooping.  they are very high wasted.  and yet even pulled all the way up, the crotch and belly are baggy and unflattering.  like wearing mens jeans.  material seems flimsy, won't hold up.  don't expect them to be warm.  the ties on the bottom are very long.  expect to cut them to a proper length.  they are also really short.  i will keep for spring/summer weather and use the bottom ties to make them into capris or something.
I am 140 pounds & 5’4 and they fit me just how i wanted! Definitely would buy the other styles from here! Loved and they came in 48 hours!
Nothing like the picture, I didn’t lime anything about these pants it was paper thin fit weird on me like it’s tight in the wrong places cheaply made for the price.

评论概述: purchased 3 times, however the quality vs price .
评论详情: i’ve bought these 3-4 times now, from july to now. the first time the price was wayy lower, but because of the material being kind of bad it ended up dissolving in between my legs when i walk. so i bought them again because i haven’t had a bunch of cargo pants i actually liked, and the same thing. it seems they only last a month :/. really not worth the money but i haven’t found anything similar i like, and this last time i bought them the button flew off the pants while i took them off, and i cant attach it back on. they fit me perfectly, look good, and i do love the pockets. but the price vs material is why i wont be replacing these every single month. they really are cute, true to size and durable, but only if you wear them 3 times a year.

评论概述: I asked for a 2X they are not they are damp and they stink
评论详情: The thickness is nice. They are a bit on the stretchy side. I can feel that.

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable, but Handle with Care
评论详情: The Viatabuna High-Waisted Cargo Pants are stylish and comfortable, offering a perfect mix of Y2K fashion and practicality. The wide-leg and baggy fit are on-trend, and the pockets are super functional for holding essentials. They give off a relaxed, effortless vibe that pairs well with a variety of outfits.  However, a word of caution—the material is on the thinner side and can rip easily if you're not careful, especially around the seams or if stretched too much. So, while they look and feel great, you’ll want to be mindful of how you wear them.

I ordered these pants in olive green a few weeks ago and I loved them! I wanted another pair in camo but it looked totally different than what is pictured. The camo looks cheap and they’re joggers instead of straight leg pants. I hate joggers!! So disappointed.

评论概述: Yes! Perfect fire hose cargo pants
评论详情: These pants fit great. I'm 145 and wear a 5/6 or 28 pant size. They fit snug and comfortably at the same time. The material is thin and so it's breathable. The fabric material had some stretch to it as well. I love the pockets. The ankles have straps to tighten or loosen but I could live without that.

The material is definitely cargo material. The material is very thick not very thick, but comfort Functionality with the pockets you have three pockets on each side and two in the back I ordered a size medium. I wear a size 8, so this works great for me.

I was looking for a pair of high waisted cargo pants that weren't super baggy and these are great!  I'm about 5' 5" and 115lbs and got an XS.  The fit and length is perfect.  Very comfortable as well.

评论概述: Back pockets tore out after wearing 1 time
评论详情: I came home after wearing one time and my husband advised immediately that one pocket had a hole and other started to tear.  Other then that fit perfect and cute

评论概述: Shrinks and falls apart in less than a week..
评论详情: I don't leave reviews.. but these pants are so horribly made that I couldn't. I tried them on the second they arrived. They are NOT high waisted.. They barely fit, I ordered a Medium, I'm 5'5 and 125lbs. They should have fit, I even measured my waist and hips according to their measurements. I washed them once, they shrunk a size.. I wore them low on my hips for maybe 3-4 days before washing them again.. They shrunk again. They used to sit just long enough to barely hit the floor without shoes, now they sit above my ankle.. That's how much they shrank in 2 washes. After the second wash I noticed the left side lower leg pocket was unstitched and ripping off the pants.  I really wanted these pants to work.. that's why I didn't return and tried to make my self wear them.. I cant even fit into them now because of how much they shrank. I'll be tossing them in the trash. Honestly so upset at the price of these pants and how horrible quality they are. Fool me once..

评论概述: Perfect Pink Cargo Pants for Petite Shoppers!
评论详情: These pink cargo pants are amazing! I love the fit—they’re super flattering—and the length is perfect, especially since I’m only 5’1. The material feels nice, but it does tend to wrinkle easily. The tie on the hem is a fantastic feature for shorter people like me, allowing for a more customized fit. I also love all the pockets; they’re so practical for carrying everything I need. The shade of pink is absolutely gorgeous and really stands out. I was pleasantly surprised at how well these fit, especially since finding pants online that work for my height is always a challenge. Overall, I’m very happy with them and would definitely recommend!

Size runs small. Bought so many of these for work and I loved them when they arrived (despite how cheap they felt) because they were lightweight and had tons of pockets. However, I ended up having to exchange/return all but one because these have constant issues with ripping out in the thigh and zippers breaking. Will never buy this brand again. Absolutely not worth the price.
They are comfortable, they run small, so size up.. the one thing I don’t like is they are bad to wrinkle, have to iron after wash.. but look nice on.. little high on price .. they are light weight..
They are very comfortable, they fit perfect. I am 5'2, 130 lbs I ordered small.

The fabric quality was thinner than expected. The pants aren't high waisted, when I do pull them up they are in my crotch and uncomfortable. They aren't tall girl friendly eithier I am 5'7 and they were directly at my ankle. I am 195lbs and ordered an XL and they were still pretty tight. I'm going to re order a XXl and see if that makes any difference and will update my review if so
Super thin super skinny waist
These are the best cargo pants…comfortable and they fit and look great! Fairly lightweight and love all the pockets! You won’t be disappointed
The material, fit, color, just everything about these are to die for. Got ‘em in dark green and beige and I’m about to order 2 other colors. I like them that much.

评论用户: SUPER CUTE but too small and I’m normally Large-XL (Ordered XL).  Definitely doesn’t fit baggy
评论详情: Didn’t fit the first time but immediately got a refund to order the next size up. I’m 5’4” - 205lbs. And I’m usually a Large-XL in pants size. I ordered the XL because it claims to be baggy, I could get it on and if I sucked in I could button/zip. But overall definitely didn’t fit for the occasion which requires dancing/sitting/moving. But I ordered the next size up (LARGEST size) XXL and it came within 3 days! Even faster than the first package! While it fits and well enough to move/dance/sit in; it’s still a bit snug. Crazy considering it’s 1-2 sizes above my normal and suppose to fit “baggy” 😂. It will definitely work and is very cute in color and design for my party, but weird material and sizing for real!
